definitions: To plan or contrive (a story, action, etc.)
To make a map or plan of (an area of land or a building)
To mark (a point or series of points) on a graph or map
To secretly plan something, especially something illegal or harmful
examples: They plot the overthrow of the government.
The surveyor will plot the boundaries of the property.
We need to plot the data points on the chart.
The conspirators plot their next move.
